feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks to indicate direct speech, indicating a similar punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts demonstrate a formal tone and use technical language related to legal matters, suggesting a similarity in lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts consist of short, concise sentences with a focus on conveying information clearly, showing similarity in sentence structure and quantitative features.

feature4.explanation: Both texts discuss legal regulations and consequences, maintaining a serious and informative tone, indicating a common text and discourse feature.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text, suggesting consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
